pkgmetadata.longdescription: Run Phoenix NLME and Perform Post-Processing // Calls 'Phoenix NLME' (non-linear mixed effects), a population modeling and simulation software, for pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics analyses and conducts post-processing of the results. This includes creation of various diagnostic plots, bootstrap and visual predictive checks. See http:// www.certara.com/software /pkpd-modeling-and-simulation/phoenix-nlme/ for more information about 'Phoenix NLME'.
